datasource.title: Secure Your Spot
datasource.description: To confirm your spot, accept the appointment and provide a credit card to hold the reservation. Then agree to our policies and sign the digital waiver. For minors, guardians must sign on their behalf.

content.value: All makeup services are performed by a licensed or makeup-certified Beauty Advisor.

datasource.title: Beauty Lesson
datasource.description: Get personalized tips and tricks during this guided tutorial - then take away the skills to do it yourself at home.

datasource.title: Full Face
datasource.description: Get a complete look with this custom-tailored service that gives your favorite feature extra attention.

datasource.title: Ultimate Glam
datasource.description: Go all out with this in-depth service that includes elevated techniques to accentuate ALL your features.

datasource.title: Lash Application
datasource.description:
Get your false lashes expertly applied for instant length and volume.*

*New strip lashes must be purchased separately at Sephora ...

datasource.title: Feature Focus
datasource.description: The perfect way to spotlight a single feature of your choice—such as eyes, complexion, or brows.

content.value: All waxing services are performed by a licensed Beauty Advisor.

datasource.title: Lip or Chin Wax
datasource.description: Get a silky-smooth upper lip or chin during this session performed by a licensed Beauty Advisor.

datasource.title: Duo Wax: Brow & Lip
datasource.description: Get custom brow-mapping and shaping with an upper-lip wax performed by a licensed Beauty Advisor.

datasource.title: Brow Wax
datasource.description: Get your brows expertly shaped by a licensed Beauty Advisor.

datasource.title: Trio Wax: Brow, Lip & Chin
datasource.description: Custom brow-mapping and shaping, plus upper-lip and chin wax, all performed by a licensed Beauty Advisor.

datasource.title: What to Expect at the Beauty Studio

content.value: Here’s what you need to know before your beauty service. More questions?

datasource.title: Arrival
datasource.description: Please arrive with makeup-free skin (preferred but not required).  Change of plans? If you need to cancel or reschedule, please do so at least 24 hours in advance.

datasource.title: Waiver
datasource.description: Upon check-in, you'll be asked to review and sign a digital Waiver of Rights and Assumption of Risk. Minors will need a guardian present to sign the waiver.

datasource.title: Gift Card Redemption
datasource.description: If you have a gift card, you can redeem in store at time of payment. Please note that a personal credit card is required to book a reservation.

serviceInfo.description: Get personalized makeup and skincare advice from one of our trained Beauty Advisors in a one-on-one interactive lesson. Your personalized lesson includes a try-teach demo, personalized product recommendations, and  special tips and techniques on how to recreate your look at home. MDM exception Re testing

datasource.title: What to Know Before You Go

content.value: Here’s what you need to know before your makeup service. More questions?

datasource.title: Arrival
datasource.description: It's best to arrive to your appointment make up free.

datasource.title: Customization
datasource.description: Your individual face will determine which feature look look our artists will create for you, and they'll work with you to make sure you love the end result.

datasource.title: Waiver
datasource.description: Clients will be asked to review and sign a digital Waiver of Rights. Minors will need guardian present to sign waiver.

policies.description: We understand that plans change! If you need to cancel or reschedule, please do so at least 24 hours in advance so that we may open the time for another client.. Appointments canceled or rescheduled less than 24 hours prior to the appointment time are subject to a cancellation fee of $25.

In order to best serve our clients, please arrive 5 minutes before your appointment and check in with a Beauty Advisor. Appointments will be canceled and charged a no-show fee of $25 if you do not arrive within 15 minutes of your booked appointment time.
If you have a gift card you can redeem in-store at time of payment. However, please note that a personal credit card is required to book a reservation.
At select locations participating in our Beauty (Re)Purposed pilot you can now bring clean, empty beauty packaging to Sephora that you can’t recycle at home.
